alert.note: Alert for Lagrange; Steuben (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 5:46AM EST until February 22 at 12:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Total ice accumulations up to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...In Indiana, Lagrange and Steuben Counties. In Michigan, St. Joseph MI County. In Ohio, Williams and Fulton OH Counties. * WHEN...Until noon EST today. * IMPACTS...Roads may become icy and bring difficult travel conditions which may impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing rain should change to rain before noon south of the Michigan border as temperatures rise above freezing.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages.
